channel.title: Zol, Introduction, and Disclaimers on
channel.description: Recent content in Zol, Introduction, and Disclaimers on

item.description: Disclaimer This is a fantasy world I originally created for hobbyist purposes. Primarily as a Dungeons and Dragons campaign setting.
Introduction In its [[Origin]], [[Zol]] was spun from the [[Sea of Monsters]] in words spoken by [[The Watcher in The Door]].
The Regions of Zol Before exploring this content please read the [[Introduction]] and [[Disclaimer]]. Zol is comprised of: 8 Kingdoms
